page.title: 05LINFORD
page.content: { Linford}is a small place just north of East Tilbury and the Bata estate.It has only small shops and a Post Office and is mainly a{residential}area. There is a Methodist Chapel and a small church called St, Francis. The { {Village Hall}has a great deal of support and the{recreation}field opposite "The George and Dragon" is the site of many village sporting activities and occasions.{ { }Most of the houses are post-war although there are a fair smattering of 30's bungalows. There is no school and the younger children mainly attend the East Tilbury primary schools while older children bus to St. Clere's in Stanford. There was a farm,"Merrie Loots", but it is now a private home for the elderly.
